description: Visually stunning with proven performance, the A220 delivers clear audio and extended bass for your games and music. It is the 2.1 speaker system that lets you make a bold statement about great design and sound. With a slimmer footprint, you can place the A220 anywhere you wish. It’s easy to reach controls ensure instant access to the Volume. Besides, it’s simple and fuss free installation makes connecting to other music devices easy and convenient. Be delightfully surprised by the performance of the A220 now!
title: Creative A220 2.1 Multimedia Speaker System
